nodes.text: Darth Homiiz was a Sith Lord. The Sith carried a lightsaber, had tan skin covered with tattoos, a patch over his right eye and wore a cloak. Homiiz had a chubby appearance, a black beard and a tail. Additionally, the Sith had a golden ring on the left hand and one through his nose.

Darth Homiiz appeared in concept art on the website of HOON, the illustrator of the 2004 Dark Horse comic Jedi: Yoda. In the concept art, Homiiz is standing next to Pix, a Jedi character from the comic. While Pix appeared in the comic, the Sith was cut from it. Neither Homiiz's species or gender could be determined from the picture.
